name: One Week At Pablo's V1.1.0
description:
WARNING: This game is not for little kids or for people that get scared easily. There ARE jumpscares, they are NOT OPTIONAL, and there are mentions of dark things like murder. PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!

=======================================

Story: You are a thief who stole $200 worth of food, and you are hiding from the police at the now-abandoned Pablo Penguin's Pizza Place, and the search will be called off in one week. If you can survive, then you will be pardoned from all crimes.

======================================

Controls

-----------------

⬅️/A   -   Close Left Door

➡️/D   -   Close Right Door

⬆️/W   -   Close Front Vent

⬇️/S/Button   -   Open/Close Cams

Click Buttons   -   Close Side Vents

====================================

Good Luck.

====================================================

Art, Animations, and Programming by MirrorKirby123

Thanks to Scott Cawthon for making FNAF, and for many sound effects.
